name: The Alchemist Remake
description:
Small game made for LDJAM 46, defend the alchemist and keep him alive. I lack time to complete it, but I am happy with the result of 3 days.

Controls:
- A, W, S, D: Movement

- Q: Change melee and range mode (MELEE IS BUGGED, USE RANGE MODE)

- Space: Jump
- Skills:
1. Normal, elemental attacks hurts but can recover mana.
2. Water, Fire no damage, water health and nature hurts.
3. Fire, Fire no damage, water hurts and nature Health.
4. Nature, Fire hurts, water health and nature no damage.
Esc: Exit game
R: If you die, you can restart game.

Bugs and improvements (that I couldn't fix and do):
- There is no control in the enemy's spawn, I had planned to spawn 3 - 6 depending on the wave (I can't reach the time)
- Depending on the wave, I wanted the enemy to be faster.
- Points for killing enemies
- more tests
